channel.title: Blogs on McCarthyEngines
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on McCarthyEngines

item.title: Inventory Optimization Strategy
item.description: Challenge: Managing and developing effective inventory strategies and policies is more difficult as companies expand their operations globally, increase the number and locations of their trading partners, proliferate their product offerings, and face increased demands from customers to fulfill their orders faster.

item.title: Network optimization
item.description: Challenge: Many supply chain networks evolve from individual decisions made over extended periods to satisfy specific business needs.

item.title: Forecasting with Demand Engine
item.description: Challenge: Demand planning approaches that rely on historical sales, with no consideration of external causal factors, are insufficient.
